text: ยง 17-1403 Carpet adhesive. Carpet adhesive used in the installation of carpet in the interior of any building in the city shall comply with subpart 228-2 of part 228 of title 6 of the official compilation of the codes, rules and regulations of the state of New York.

chapter.text: LIMITS ON VOLATILE ORGANIC COMPOUND EMISSIONS IN CARPET AND CARPET CUSHION
